idea-plugin.name: KordEx Utils
idea-plugin.description:
This plugins adds helper features for developing Discord bots using KordEx.

It currently has the following features:

  • Adds gutter icons to Commands and Events, blue is for public, gold is for ephemeral, each type has its proper icon.
  • Show translations for command's names/descriptions/alias (if any), same for arguments.
  • Moves you to action DSL when you click on it.

Officially supporting the following versions of KordEx:
1.5.3-SNAPSHOT through 1.5.5-SNAPSHOT

It may work on older versions, but it is not guaranteed.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 0.5.1

    Performance regression to fix support for 2022.1.

  • 0.5.0

    Add translations annotations to Arguments classes.
    Fix translations annotations not being added if the bundle is not found and is not inside a translate function.
    Remove support to Intellij 2022.3 as adding support to it removes support to 2022.1 without a complex workaround.
    Updated to Kotlin 1.7.20.

  • 0.4.0

    Add aliasKey from chatCommand to gutter icon tooltip.
    Listen to file changes to update translations.
    Show translations into the gutter icon tooltip.
    Remove support to IntelliJ 2021.3.

  • 0.3.0

    Hovering a translation key using a string literal will show the translation in the tooltip.
    Also warns you if no bundle is set.

  • 0.2.1

    Hovering an event now shows the event name.
    Updated minimum Intellij version to 2021.3 and maximum to 2022.3.

  • 0.2.0

    Hovering gutter now shows you the name & description of the command/event and let you click to jump to the action DSL.
    Removed the KordEx dependency to reduce the size of the plugin.

  • 0.1.2

    Fix link of KordEx.

  • 0.1.1

    Fix compilation of plugin.

  • 0.1.0

    Add gutter to commands & events.
    Clicking on it moves you to action method.

action.description: Moves the cursor to the action of the actual command or event.
